meanings.definition: A decorative motif consisting of a series of convex curves
meanings.sent1: The artist added intricate godroons to the border of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The antique vase was adorned with delicate godroons along its rim.
meanings.sent3: The cake decorator used frosting to create godroons on the birthday cake.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight danced on the godroons of the fountain, creating a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The castle's grand entrance featured elaborate godroons that caught the eye of every visitor.

meanings.definition: To decorate with a series of convex curves
meanings.sent1: She carefully godrooned the edges of the table with a steady hand.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman godroons the metal frame to give it an elegant look.
meanings.sent3: The baker decided to godroon the cupcakes with colorful icing for the party.
meanings.sent4: The gardener godroons the hedges to create a unique pattern in the garden.
meanings.sent5: He used a special tool to godroon the leather belt with intricate designs.
